Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Receive 3,000 bonus miles and Double the miles on all local and overseas spend in the first 3 months.

Earn 1.2 miles for every S$1 local spend; 2 miles for every $1 on overseas spend. Earn 3 miles for every $1 spent on online flights (eg: Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, Silkair, JetStar, AirAsia etc) and accomodation (eg: Airbnb, Agoda, Expedia, Zuji etc).
Annual fee is waived if annual spending exceeds S$25,000. Earn 10,000 bonus miles when annual fee of S$192.60 is paid.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_details
Details.Feature: 3,000 bonus miles + Double miles on all local and overseas spend in the first 3 months

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Apply online by 30 April 2016. 2. Charge a minimum of S$800 to your new Card within 1 month of card approval to receive 3,000 bonus miles. 3. Charge a minimum of S$800 per month and up to a maximum of S$6,000 per month to enjoy double miles on local and overseas spend.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Air Miles Conversion Fee: S$42.80 annually
Air Miles Conversion Fee: S$42.80 annually
Minimum Repayment: 3% of statement balance or S$50.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: DBS Altitude American Express Cardholders must be registered with DBS Frequent Flyer Programme with a non-waivable annual fee of S$42.80. 1 DBS point can be converted to 2 Miles in blocks of 5000 points.

1. Apply online by 30 April 2016. 2. Charge a minimum of S$800 to your new Card within 1 month of card approval to receive 3,000 bonus miles 3. Charge a minimum of S$800 per month and up to a maximum of S$6,000 per month to enjoy double miles on local and overseas spend.
Additional miles awarded for online booking of flights and accomodation is capped at S$10,000 per calendar month.
